Description: Rim sherd of Chian pottery Ionian cup with everted rim; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; three bands in added white with trace of added red; exterior: wide brown band, reserved below.
Curator's comments: The sherd joins British Museum 1924,1201.171. For parallels regarding the shape, see Boardman, J., Excavations in Chios 1952-1955. Greek Emporio. Annual of the British School at Athens Supplement 6. Oxford 1967, 171, no. 864, fig. 118.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1909) (phase 2)
